description: Master essential geometry concepts through interactive lessons covering shapes, angles, theorems, and spatial reasoning.

lessons.title: Introduction to Geometry
lessons.description: Understanding points, lines, planes, and basic geometric concepts

sections.content: Welcome to Geometry
Geometry is the study of shapes, sizes, positions, and properties of space. It's all around us in architecture, art, nature, and technology.

lessons.title: Angles and Their Properties
lessons.description: Understanding angle types, measurements, and relationships

sections.content: Exploring Angles
Angles are formed when two rays meet at a common point. Understanding angles is fundamental to geometry and helps us analyze shapes and spaces.

lessons.title: Triangles and Their Properties
lessons.description: Types of triangles, angle sum theorem, and triangle congruence

sections.content: The Power of Triangles
Triangles are the most fundamental polygon in geometry. They're rigid structures used in engineering and have special properties that make them essential to study.

lessons.title: Quadrilaterals and Polygons
lessons.description: Squares, rectangles, parallelograms, and other polygons

sections.content: Four-Sided Figures and Beyond
Quadrilaterals are four-sided polygons with diverse properties. From squares to trapezoids, each shape has unique characteristics and applications.

lessons.title: Circles and Their Components
lessons.description: Radius, diameter, circumference, and circle theorems

sections.content: The Perfect Shape
Circles are perfectly symmetrical shapes with unique properties. Understanding circles is essential for advanced geometry and real-world applications.

lessons.title: Area and Perimeter
lessons.description: Calculating area and perimeter of various shapes

sections.content: Measuring Space
Area measures the space inside a shape, while perimeter measures the distance around it. These fundamental measurements apply to countless real-world situations.
Three-Dimensional Geometry
Moving beyond flat shapes, we explore three-dimensional objects and learn to calculate their volume and surface area.

lessons.title: The Pythagorean Theorem
lessons.description: Understanding and applying this fundamental theorem

sections.content: A² + B² = C²
The Pythagorean Theorem is one of the most famous and useful theorems in mathematics, relating the sides of right triangles.

lessons.title: Similarity and Congruence
lessons.description: Understanding when shapes are the same or proportional

sections.content: Comparing Shapes
Shapes can be congruent (identical) or similar (same shape, different size). These relationships are crucial for geometric reasoning and proofs.

lessons.title: Transformations and Symmetry
lessons.description: Translations, rotations, reflections, and symmetrical properties

sections.content: Moving and Transforming Shapes
Geometric transformations allow us to move and change shapes while preserving certain properties. Symmetry reveals the beauty and balance in geometric forms.
